page.title: 14Artistic Leicester
page.content: Leicester is a major{art centre}of the {Midlands.}Theatre goers are well catered for with{3 theatres,}the main one being the{Haymarket.}Local schools actively participate in theatre, such as the{Leicestershire Festival of {Drama and Dance.}The{Leicester Museum} has a wide variety of exhibits, from minerals to reconstructed dinosaurs. The{Newarke Houses}contain among other exhibits, historic costumes. Leicester's numerous{cinemas}show all of the major releases. The{De Montfort {Hall}holds concerts by famous rock groups and orchestras. The{Polytechnic is nationally famous for its fashion and art students. There are also many small galleries exhibiting paintings, photographs and sculptures, eg the{ {Loseby Gallery. }
